title: Best of The Herd: 08/10/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/10/2018
description:
Colin says people need to have a higher standard for Baker Mayfield as the number one overall pick and playing well against the Giants’ 4th string defense isn't enough. He thinks the Giants will regret drafting Saquon Barkley because he isn't an every down back. Plus, Fox NFL Insider Jay Glazer talks with Colin about the Cowboys being under the radar and whether the Rams locker room will become an issue. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
